root.name: Rune Factory 4
root.description: OverviewRune Factory 4 is the sixth entry in the fantasy RPG/farming sim series which is a spin-off of the Harvest Moon franchise. Neverland returned as the game's developer and Marvelous published the title in Japan on July 19, 2012 for the Nintendo 3DS, a series first. In 2013 XSEED, who had previously worked on Frontier, published the fourth Rune Factory in the United States instead of Natsume, who was the series' traditionally publisher in North America.ReceptionThe game sold 85,955 units in its first week in Japan. Well beyond the 52,049 units sold by Rune Factory 2 during the same period and went on to become the best selling game in the series.
